# stripe_v2_billing_pricing_plan (Resource)

Manages a stripe_v2_billing_pricing_plan resource in Stripe.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `currency` (String) The currency of the PricingPlan.
- `display_name` (String) Display name of the PricingPlan. Maximum 250 characters.
- `tax_behavior` (String) The Stripe Tax tax behavior - whether the PricingPlan is inclusive or exclusive of tax.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of pricing plan subscription.
- `lookup_key` (String) An internal key you can use to search for a particular PricingPlan. Maximum length of 200 characters.
- `metadata` (Map of String) Set of [key-value pairs](/docs/api/metadata) that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
